comment.author: 14279793@N06
comment._content:
Thanks for posting this. ... I am addicted to WWI aeroplanes and build models of them for the museum here in Denver. ... I like this plane because of the twin LeRhone rotary engines.
.

comment._content: We are going to upload a lot more images in the coming days...including WW1 A/C! Keep an eye out!
